extendedInfo.description: PowerTools for SDG&E is a free, secure app that helps you understand your energy use, take action to reduce your energy costs, and stay connected to SDG&E.PowerTools for SDG&E uses your actual energy data through Green Button Connect My Data. You must be an SDG&E customer, use My Account and register for a login at http://www.sdge.com/using-green-button-connect-my-data.If you are a San Diego Gas & Electric customer, PowerTools allows you to:Â· Understand your energy use on an hourly, daily or monthly basisÂ· Compare your energy use against weather and your average useÂ· Learn about actions you can take to reduce your energy use, including rebates on energy efficient appliances and moreÂ· Set and track goals to save energyÂ· Pay your bill online, or find a payment locationÂ· See a real-time map and status of outages in San DiegoÂ· Follow local energy news via SDG&E's Twitter feedÂ· Collect EcoScore points for saving energyÂ· Watch videos about programs available to customers and tips to save energyPowerTools for SDG&E is Smart Grid Privacy Certified by TRUSTe for protection of your personal information and energy use data.

reviews.title: Please do some updates!
reviews.comment: 1. Allow users to be kept logged in... It\'s a pain to enter password every time... 2. Make the interface faster.. Takes a long time after hitting any button... 3. Given the kwh usage until today and given the sdge cost of each kwh.. Can you give a \"cost so far\" number along with the graph?
reviews.author: Shikhanshu Agarwal
